snippet: In a letter of condolence to the people of Venezuela, Iran’s president struck a note of interfaith harmony, expressing confidence that Hugo Chávez would be resurrected, along with Jesus and the Hidden Imam.
abstract: In a letter of condolence to the people of Venezuela, Iran’s president struck a note of interfaith harmony, expressing confidence that Hugo Chávez would be resurrected, along with Jesus and the Hidden Imam.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and THOMAS ERDBRINK

headline.main: Ahmadinejad Says Chávez Will Rise Again
